channel.title: Comments on: PIC18F2550 KS0108 Graphical LCD Oscilloscope Videos
channel.description: Intermediate in flow properties between solids and liquids; highly viscous.

item.title: By: Homemade oscilloscope on AVR - Pulse Induction Metal Detectors
item.dc:creator: Homemade oscilloscope on AVR - Pulse Induction Metal Detectors
item.description: […] based on PIC18F2550 microcontroller and a KS0108 controller based graphical LCD. That was Steven Cholewiak’s web site. I had never seen before so amazing microcontroller-only oscilloscope. That was realy impressive […]

item.title: By: Michael
item.dc:creator: Michael
item.description:
Hi, that's a fantastic project and I think I'm going to built it!
Anyway, What is the maximum level of voltage peak to peak that the oscilloscope supports?
Thank you..
item.content:encoded:
Hi, that’s a fantastic project and I think I’m going to built it!

Anyway, What is the maximum level of voltage peak to peak that the oscilloscope supports?

Thank you..

item.title: By: albert
item.dc:creator: albert
item.description: I have problems with the library, GLCD – modified.c I made the changes I have mentioned but still errors, please could you upload the modified GLCD library for GLCD – modified.c
item.content:encoded: I have problems with the library, GLCD – modified.c I made the changes I have mentioned but still errors, please could you upload the modified GLCD library for GLCD – modified.c

item.title: By: Antonio
item.dc:creator: Antonio
item.description:
Hi congratulations for the project,
I'm﻿ an Italian radioamateur and would like to make a portable oscilloscope.
I have a pi18F4550 and a GLCD 128 x 64 pixels
I found your code for my micro.
Is it possible to have the scheme to connect my micro?
thanks Antonio IZ1QXJ
Antonio
IZ1QXJ
item.content:encoded:
Hi congratulations for the project,

I’m﻿ an Italian radioamateur and would like to make a portable oscilloscope.

I have a pi18F4550 and a GLCD 128 x 64 pixels

I found your code for my micro.

Is it possible to have the scheme to connect my micro?

thanks
Antonio
IZ1QXJ

Antonio

IZ1QXJ
